app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2079-7737/9/2/26/s1, Table S1: RT-PCR protocol targeted on Nigerian LASV nucleoprotein, Table S2: List of LASV sequences from rodents used in the analysis ( n = 102), Table S3: List of LASV sequences from humans used in the analysis ( n = 96).
